attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prisoners should have NO rights,I firmly believe that any rights(including voting)people have should be taken away when in prison.

This country is giving in to stupid laws all the time,but this farce with prisoners and voting is going too far,they comitted a crime,and got caught losing any rights they did have!

Do NOT give in on this,or the floodgates will open for even more stupid laws to ruin this country!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
